programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber’s license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A music producer fallen from grace finds an artist who has everything needed to make it big and discovers the one thing holding him back, paralyzing stage fright.

programme.title: Brahms: The Boy 2
programme.desc: Terror strikes a young family when they move into a new home and their son discovers a hauntingly life-like porcelain doll called Brahms.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China 2
programme.desc: In the sequel to the Tsui Hark classic, Wong Fei-Hung faces The White Lotus society, a fanatical cult seeking to drive the Europeans out of China through violence, even attacking Chinese who follow Western ways.

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A life-changing story of a man who has lived as a loner his entire life. Jae Shik begins to live together with a child with a hearing-visual disability, as they change each other's lives and try to find a way to communicate.

programme.title: The Golden Holiday
programme.desc: Byeong-Soo works as a detective in the countryside and takes his family on a trip to the Philippines. He becomes involved in a crime planned by Patric, becoming a murder suspect.

programme.title: The Hitman'S Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: An assassin goes to Thailand in order to solve a kidnapping case and finds himself chased by a man whose sibling he killed.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A veteran gangster looking to retire from a life of crime in the violent port town of Kuam, Korea unexpectedly gets caught in the middle of a mob war with bloody consequences.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: Seven years after the roundup in Vietnam, Ma Seok-do joins a new squad to investigate a murder case. He soon starts to dig deeper when he finds out the case involves a synthetic drug and a gang of thugs.

programme.title: Nefarious
programme.desc: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben experiences the art of cheese making. He meets a capsicum producer and learns about the provenance of the onion.

programme.title: Essence Of India
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Essence Of India
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren has arrived into Cape Town. This won’t be your average culinary exploration of a city; Warren has dedicated the entire episode to diving into a specific style of South African cooking known as ‘Cape Malay’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Experience a chronological recounting of the Apollo 13 near-disaster, one of NASA’s most devastating—and finest—moments. Witness the events of April 1970 as they unfolded through news footage, mission control audio, and NASA archives.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Examine the 2002 sniper attacks in Washington D.C. through police audio and video, as well as local and national news reports. The sniper’s three-week reign of terror triggered one of the most intense and complicated manhunts in American history.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the foundations of Cryptocurrency and talk to the local crypto pioneers who risked it all.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: Now we know why Crypto is such a big deal, through this episode we’ll meet the family behind one of NZ’s biggest Crypto success stories. We’ll dispel some crypto myths and cover the basics of how to get on board.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: CEO Aaron McDonald and Co-Founder Brooke Howard-Smith tell us how they created a multi-million dollar NFT business here in Aotearoa and are collaborating with international superstars.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: It's an inspirational episode, we spend time with the team taking Māori to the metaverse and check-in on a couple of local disrupters focused on making digital worlds where everyone feels like they can belong.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: What if Bitcoin mining could actually save the world? Over this episode, we meet the local company on a mission to use it to help solve global warming.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: We profile Kaye-Maree Dunn, an innovator developing digital data sovereignty and we find out how NFTs can allow us to own our own artificial intelligence. It's an episode that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Gameplay: The Story Of The Videogame Revolution
programme.desc: Gameplay is a feature on the history of videogames. From Pong to Pac Man, Super Mario to Lara Croft, Doom, Grand Theft Auto and beyond, we chronicle the remarkable story of the fastest evolving new media of all time.

programme.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: The One And Only
programme.desc: Witness the journey from the young Portuguese prodigy to one of the greatest players of all time. This is the one and only...Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Gerrard: Born To Lead
programme.desc: In an illustrious professional career that spans over 20 years, Gerrard has experienced and succeeded at the pinnacle of the sport, lifting trophies as a player and manager, and representing his country. But with the highs, came the lows.

programme.title: Kate Winslet: Leading Lady
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: Witness the fighter-bomber F-111 in action, from the jungle battles of Vietnam to the desert wars of the Middle East.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: See how the P-47 Thunderbolt dominated the skies while dealing destruction on the ground in both Germany and the Pacific.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the foundations of Cryptocurrency and talk to the local crypto pioneers who risked it all.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: It's an inspirational episode, we spend time with the team taking Māori to the metaverse and check-in on a couple of local disrupters focused on making digital worlds where everyone feels like they can belong.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena visits a city steeped in tradition... and gravy, as he indulges in hearty planted-based Quebecois classics—poutine, smoked “meat” sandwiches, tourtiere, and the famous Montreal bagel.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: When Olivia's class holds a pet talent show, nobody can beat Francine's amazingly talented cat Gwendolyn. Olivia's lethargic cat Edwin, who barely moves, suddenly goes missing. Olivia then fancies herself a cat detective as shetracks down the missing cat.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia's lemonade stand is losing customers to Francine's pink lemonade stand. Olivia does her one better by opening up her own full-scale backyard restaurant, imagining it's a fabulous supper club. But Olivia soon finds that her restaurant needs something she can only get from Francine – something pink!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now broken out of mind control, Layla goes undercover with the gang, hiding the fact that she’s no longer being controlled. The crew is shocked to discover that revered martyr Rafaela Moreno is still alive and is the mastermind behind the mind control plot. Rafaela puts Layla’s driving to the test in a wild race against a mystery driver, then takes the rest of the crew hostage just days before Rafaela's dastardly plot.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now in Rafaela’s custody, the crew works together to break Echo out to retrieve the hauler. Echo makes it into the jungle and must battle a mind-controlled Ms. Nowhere using everything she’s learned about spying and survival from the very woman who's out to get her. Meanwhile, Rafaela enlists Frostee to help her develop a non-exploding version of the mind control formula before her plan goes into motion at the favela race.

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Unkind Ladies
programme.desc: This drama features the women of three generations and people around them. Mari grows up as a good teacher of this generation where there is no true mentor. Hyeonsuk, who has been a troublemaker, realizes the love and support of her family. Kang Sunok regards herself as unlucky, but later on realizes how happy she has been. How can you hold up when your life gets tough? You will figure it out by holding up day by day, just like these women in the drama.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Recipe for Love
programme.desc: In Onjeong Market, located in Onjeong, a town some distance away from Seoul, the area is buzzing with change as apartment complexes are built and plans for subway extensions and new town developments are announced. Across a single street stand a principled general hospital, Gongmyeongjeongdae Clinic, and traditional Korean clinic, Yangji Barun Clinic. The two families who run these places have been bitter enemies for years, bound by a long standing grudge from an incident in the past. Even the smallest matters turn into big fights, making them the most famous rival families in Onjeong. This is a family growth drama about these two families as they unravel their long held misunderstandings, heal their wounds, learn to love one another, and are reborn as one family.

programme.title: Music Bank K-Chart
programme.desc: Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Boss in the Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examinations to create truly fulfilling workplaces.

programme.title: Oh My Venus
programme.desc: A love story between Kim Youngho, a flawless personal trainer struggling to overcome his childhood injury, and Kang Jueun, who used to be an icon of first love but is just an overweight lawyer now.

programme.title: Unkind Ladies
programme.desc: This drama features the women of three generations and people around them. Mari grows up as a good teacher of this generation where there is no true mentor. Hyeonsuk, who has been a troublemaker, realizes the love and support of her family. Kang Sunok regards herself as unlucky, but later on realizes how happy she has been. How can you hold up when your life gets tough? You will figure it out by holding up day by day, just like these women in the drama.

programme.title: Glaciers
programme.desc: Glaciers possess a very special kind of “power.” They have acted as a catalyst for the birth and evolution of life on Earth. Glaciers are the source of human life and one of the most important partners in the Earth's climate system. However, due to global warming, glaciers are gradually disappearing. What, then, is happening to glaciers? This documentary explores what we must do to prevent the disappearance of glaciers, which may threaten the future of the Earth.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Amidst financial troubles, Disney hires an ingenious marketing whiz who helps them figure out how to bring their beloved characters off the screen and into the hands of millions.

programme.title: All Things Durian
programme.desc: Durian season is an annual celebration in Southeast Asia. From the surprising kampung types to the glamorous clones and the mysterious wild species – nothing beats durian!

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: The three remaining survivalists brace themselves for the fight to the finish. One participant finds it impossible to stay warm, while others risk it all on the ice. Only one can claim the $500,000 prize.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: What lies beneath? David Duchovny takes us into the top-secret government bases and the clandestine operations they were built to conceal. Discover a deadly poison lab, a nuclear missile site and more.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: Forget the moon or the stars—every government has even bigger designs in the race to dominate the sky. Uncover a plane crash in North Carolina that almost triggered nuclear Armageddon.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: They've been called the world's greatest archaeological enigma. 2,000-year-old geoglyphs made in the Peruvian desert that span over 50 miles. The drawings are so massive, they can be seen from the air.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: A new, subsurface investigation on Skinwalker Ranch leads to a baffling discovery near Homestead Two.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: After finding Nazi artifacts at a sunken pier, Darrell continues his search to a site known as Target 3 where they find a possible component of a Nazi secret weapon that changes their investigation.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Chick Boy
programme.desc: Stars in this comedy about university students living in the fast lane though they cannot afford to. They find work as helpers to a rich woman with three beautiful nieces. Of course they turn on the charm for the girls and their aunt.

programme.title: Megamol
programme.desc: A rich old lady, who was dying, hired a detective agency to go in search of her long lost granddaughter. Lacking the manpower for the job, janitor Andrew E was passed off as a private detective.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc:
Behind every great love is a great story.
In Seabrook, South Carolina in the 1940s, teenaged debutante Allie Hamilton and local boy Noah Calhoun spend one passionate, carefree summer together and deeply in love. But when the summer ends, war and duty separate the young couple.
Today, an elderly man visits a nursing home to read from his notebook to a woman whose memory is fading. As he spins a tale of two young lovers with their whole lives before them, his beloved Allie relives a long-ago passion that has never died, an unbreakable bond between two ordinary people rendered extraordinary by the strength, power and beauty of true love.
Based on the novel by Nicholas Sparks, author of A Walk to Remember and Message in a Bottle.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 3
programme.desc: Michael tests gravity when he floats the idea of astronaut snacks; his darkness-triggering popcorn is too newfangled for one movie goer; and he astonishes an antique store employee with glass figurines that feel emotion and repair themselves!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 4
programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 6
programme.desc: Michael fishes for trouble in a toy store with pop-up books that contain live animals and, at a health food store, he makes a woman's day by showing her how to milk almonds. Later, a mummy causes an employee to question ancient curses.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 7
programme.desc: Michael gets spooky at an antique store with a vintage voodoo doll and, at a costume store, a Dorothy outfit comes complete with a little dog too. Then, at an arcade, the atmosphere turns from fun to freaky for an employee when Michael gets "zapped" from one game to the next.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9
programme.desc: Michael works at a camping store where his life-saving s'mores and pop-up coolers stun would-be glampers, and later at a health food store, a child safety pill bottle with built-in invisibility proves too complicated for adults. programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted

They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

Armed with his demon-slaying sword, he battles the demons to save Liu Li and protect the city.

programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.desc: A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Pistes Vertes
programme.desc: Christophe Lepetit, baker and restaurateur in Bayeux, created a short supply chain for flour production. He partnered with a farmer in Ryes to install a mill on his farm, right next to the field where the wheat grows. The flour is then sold to local artisans.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Nos Amis Sauvages
programme.desc: The immense bearded vulture has returned to the Alps. Good news, as this natural cleaner rids the mountains of the carcasses of ibex or sheep. Let's watch its spectacular flight at the foot of one of its nests near Martigny...

programme.title: A Travers Champs
programme.desc: While we are rethinking our relationships with towns and our buying habits, urban farming is becoming part of the conversation. A movement on the rise uniting community gardens, individuals, large producers and urban farming cooperatives.

programme.title: Pistes Vertes
programme.desc: Near Louviers, in Eure, two schoolteachers fulfilled their dream: launching an educational farm. They welcome animals and maintain a large organic vegetable garden, around which they organize workshops.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Snow White and the Prince got married even though they don't really know each other at all...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: A Travers Champs
programme.desc: While we are rethinking our relationships with towns and our buying habits, urban farming is becoming part of the conversation. A movement on the rise uniting community gardens, individuals, large producers and urban farming cooperatives.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.desc: The immense bearded vulture has returned to the Alps. Good news, as this natural cleaner rids the mountains of the carcasses of ibex or sheep. Let's watch its spectacular flight at the foot of one of its nests near Martigny...

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Bestioles & Cie
programme.desc: Whether it's a lake, tree or field, there are always a host of mini-creatures. Often feared, because unknown, we discover just how fascinating they are as we take an immersive visit into their world. Often, and wrongly, underestimated, they play an essential role in the natural cycle of life.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc: In Toulon, Jimmy's body is found hanging in his saloon-restaurant, dressed in full cowboy regalia. Clearly a murder disguised as suicide, Marianne's team investigate the world of country dance and western riding enthusiasts. Everyone seems to have adored Jimmy, and yet, several suspects quickly stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc: An experienced HGV driver is found dead, crushed by the wheels of his lorry. An investigation that immerses Marianne and her team in the world of the long-distance lorry drivers.

programme.title: Les Amants De Brasmort
programme.desc: Brasmort is a barge cemetery. This is where Jean, a down-and-out sailor, and Monique, the daughter of a very rich shipowner, declare their love for each other. But they will need courage to face up to all that separates them.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Garcons, Un Film De Genre
programme.desc: In two schools, in Montreal and Matane, the secondary school pupils are invited to participate in the making of a short film in their art and drama classes. The set theme: gender stereotypes. It's the start of a creative process that will take an entire year.

programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.desc: How to eat well, move well, sleep well? In each episode, Captain Stella Tonus of the Body Fleet Federation journeys inside the human body aboard the vessel Positron. Her aim: to teach children about the beneficial or harmful effects of the things they do in their everyday lives.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 213
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 12
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 37
programme.desc: This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he vowed to seek revenge against the influential retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 38
programme.desc: This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he vowed to seek revenge against the influential retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 1
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 213
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.)

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 1
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 2

This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 3
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.desc: Maya, a young nurse who has been having terrifying nightmares finds out a horrifying truth about a debt that was made to save her life when she was a child. As she's about to find out, the payment just may cost her much more than her life.
